elements.name: sc-upload
elements.desc: This element allows you to attach, upload, and download files.

elements.name: sc-upload-listview
elements.desc: This is a view element that displays sc-upload attachments in a list format.

elements.name: sc-upload-listview-dummy
elements.desc: This is a dummy field element used in the sc-upload-listview element.

elements.name: sc-upload-listview-filename
elements.desc: This is a file name field element used in the sc-upload-listview element.

elements.name: sc-upload-listview-filesize
elements.desc: This is a file size field element used in the sc-upload-listview element.

elements.name: sc-upload-listview-selection
elements.desc: This is a file selection field element used in the sc-upload-listview element.

elements.name: sc-upload-listview-state
elements.desc: This is a file status field element used in the sc-upload-listview element.

elements.name: sc-upload-listview-template
elements.desc: This is a template element that can implement custom fields in the sc-upload-listview element.

elements.name: sc-upload-thumbnail-box
elements.desc: This is a thumbnail box element used in the sc-upload-thumbnailview element.

elements.name: sc-upload-thumbnailview
elements.desc: This is a view element that shows sc-upload attachments in thumbnail form.

elements.name: sc-upload-util
elements.desc: This is a utility class used in sc-upload.
